title: Here Are 3 Stocks Poised to Surge After the Coronavirus Pandemic
description:
The S&P 500 crashed 17% due to the coronavirus pandemic. Netflix, Disney, and Tesla are well-positioned to take off once the economy reopens.

content:
• Investors who missed the recent bounce have the opportunity to enter the stock market once the crisis is over.
